text.text: Carnotaurus was medium theropod from South America. Found in the La Colonia Formation, the Carnotaurus would've feared other Carnotaurus and particularly feisty prey. First discovered in 1984, it was described in 1985.
Carnotaurus was 8 meters from nose to tail and would've presued anything it could get its jaws arround. Throwing its massive weight arround, this bulky creature would've been a feared predator.
